name: Terminal (CLI)
description: Learn the basics of navigating and manipulating files using the Command-Line Interface on Unix and Windows.

name: VIM
description: Master VIM, a powerful terminal-based text editor, essential for fast and efficient coding in the CLI.

name: Git & GitHub
description: Understand version control with Git and collaborate using GitHub for managing code and projects.

name: Python
description: Get started with Python programming, covering variables, control structures, functions, scripting, and working with SQLite.

name: HTML
description: Build the structure of web pages using HTML, the foundational language of the web.

name: CSS
description: Style and design websites with CSS, including selectors, layouts, colors, and typography.

name: Flexbox
description: Learn Flexbox to build responsive layouts easily using CSS's flexible box model.

name: Tailwind CSS
description: Use Tailwind CSS utility-first classes to rapidly build modern, responsive interfaces.

name: JavaScript
description: Add interactivity and dynamic behavior to websites using modern JavaScript (ES6+).

name: React
description: Develop reusable UI components and SPA functionality with React and React Hooks.

name: Flask
description: Create lightweight web apps and REST APIs using Flask. You'll also learn to connect with MySQL and use SQLAlchemy as the ORM.

name: Node JS
description: Learn backend development with Node.js, focusing on servers, databases, and full stack apps.

name: Next JS
description: Enhance React apps with Next.js by adding routing, server-side rendering, and API routes.
